documentation.title: KoolCombobox Class [PHP]
documentation.metakeywords: php combobox,php ajax combobox, php combo box,php dropdown list
documentation.metadescription: KoolComboBox extends the capability of combobox to the max.Easy-to-use, highly customized interface, advanced behavior options are the strongest points that make KoolComboBox better than any other industrial similar controls.

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: Get or set id of KoolCombobox
property.longdesc: Get or set the id for KoolCombobox. This id will be use as variable name of KoolCombobox at client-side.
property.samplecode: <?php $kcb->id="kac";//We usuall use the same id name with server-side for better reference. ?>

property.name: width
property.shortdesc: Get or set the width for combobox
property.longdesc: Get or set the width for combobox
property.samplecode:
<?php
	$kcb->width="100px";
	//Specify width by pixels 
	$kcb->width="100%";
	//Specify width by percent 
?>

property.name: styleFolder
property.shortdesc: Get or set folder which contain css style for KoolCombobox
property.longdesc: Get or set folder which contain css style for KoolCombobox

property.name: openDirection

value.desc: ComboBox open option panel at bottom.
ComboBox open option panel at top.

property.shortdesc: Get or set open direction of combobox
property.longdesc: Get or set open direction of combobox
property.samplecode: <?php $kcb->openDirection="up";//Set "up" as direction to open option panel ?>

property.name: superAbove
property.shortdesc: Get or set whether whether "shim" technique is used.
property.longdesc: Get or set whether whether "shim" technique is used. This is very useful if your application running in IE6 because it helps option panel to open above all other elements.

property.name: effect

value.desc: Combobox open option panel at bottom.

property.shortdesc: Get or set the open effect of KoolCombobox's option panel
property.longdesc: Get or set the open effect of KoolCombobox's option panel. Note: More effects will be added in the future.

property.name: boxWidth
property.shortdesc: Get or set the width of option panel in KoolCombobox
property.longdesc: Get or set the width of option panel in KoolCombobox
property.samplecode:
<?php
	$kcb->boxWidth="200px";
	//Set the fixed width for option panel 
	$kcb->boxWidth="auto";
	//Width of option panel will be equal to width of KoolCombobox 
?>

property.name: boxHeight
property.shortdesc: Get or set the height of option panel in KoolCombobox
property.longdesc: Get or set the height of option panel in KoolCombobox
property.samplecode:
<?php
	$kcb->boxHeight="200px";
	//Set the fixed height for option panel 
	$kcb->boxHeight="auto";
	//The height of option panel will be auto between minBoxHeight and maxBoxHeight 
?>

property.name: minBoxHeight
property.shortdesc: Get or set the min height of option panel in KoolCombobox
property.longdesc: Get or set the min height of option panel in KoolCombobox

property.name: maxBoxHeight
property.shortdesc: Get or set the max height of option panel in KoolCombobox
property.longdesc: Get or set the max height of option panel in KoolCombobox

property.name: align

value.desc: Align option panel to the left.
Align option panel to the right.

property.shortdesc: Get or set the alignment of option panel in KoolCombobox
property.longdesc: Get or set the alignment of option panel in KoolCombobox

property.name: headerTemplate
property.shortdesc: Get or set the header template of option panel
property.longdesc: Get or set the header template of option panel

property.name: itemTemplate
property.shortdesc: Get or set the item template of option panel.
property.longdesc: Get or set the item template of option panel. The template contains marking to be replaced item's data. For example, {text} will be replaced by the text of each items.
property.samplecode: itemTemplate="{text}"; //Make item appears with an image and text ?>

property.name: footerTemplate
property.shortdesc: Get or set the footer template of option panel
property.longdesc: Get or set the footer template of option panel

property.name: inputValidate
property.shortdesc: Get or set whether input inserted to combobox will be validated.
property.longdesc: Get or set whether input inserted to combobox will be validated. If true the selected option must be one of items in option panel.

property.name: serviceFunction
property.shortdesc: Get or set the name of koolajax-enabled function that will be used to update item list from server
property.longdesc: Get or set the name of koolajax-enabled function that will be used to update item list from server The service function will will take a text agurment ( this is the text that user keys in at client-side and sent to server-side) and return an array contain item data.
property.samplecode:
<?php
	function getdata($text)
	{
		$data = array(); 
		array_push($data,array("text"=>"Software","value"=>"software","image"=>"software.gif"));
		array_push($data,array("text"=>"Hardware","value"=>"hardware","image"=>"hardware.gif"));
		return $data; 
	} 
	$koolajax->enableFunction("getdata"); 
	$kcb->serviceFunction="getdata";
	//Set reference to service-function 
?>

method.name: addItem
method.shortdesc: Add item to option list of KoolCombobox
method.longdesc: Add item to option list of KoolCombobox
method.samplecode:
<?php
	$kcb->addItem("Software","software",array("image"=>"software.gif"),true,true);
    //The array contain custom data depended on the definition from user
?>
